mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, title, name, password, contents, regDate FROM board ORDER BY boardNum DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{listCount}
SELECT boardNum, title, name, password, contents, regDate FROM board WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardNum, title, name, password, contents, regDate) VALUE (0, #{title}, #{name}, #{password}, #{contents}, SYSDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, contents = #{contents} WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
